actor_awards.notes: Best known for his role as Superman in the 1950s television series Adventures of Superman. He received a Star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame for his work in Television.

filmography.title: Gone with the Wind
filmography.role_description: One of the red-headed Tarleton twins who flirts with Scarlett O'Hara in the opening scene.
filmography.plot: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

filmography.title: Superman and the Mole Men
filmography.role_description: The Man of Steel who intervenes when a small town forms a mob against small humanoid creatures emerging from an oil well.
filmography.plot: Reporters Clark Kent and Lois Lane arrive in a small town to cover the drilling of the world's deepest oil well, only to discover humanoid creatures emerging from the ground.

filmography.title: So Proudly We Hail!
filmography.role_description: A soldier who falls in love with a nurse in the Philippines during World War II.
filmography.plot: The story of a group of Red Cross nurses in the Philippines during the early days of World War II.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress (Paulette Goddard)

filmography.title: From Here to Eternity
filmography.role_description: A sergeant in the company who interacts with Prewitt and Warden.
filmography.plot: In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing in his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are having an affair.

filmography.title: The Strawberry Blonde
filmography.role_description: A conceited college student and rival.
filmography.plot: A dentist looks back on his life and realizes he married the right girl after all, despite initially pining for her friend.

filmography.title: Blood and Sand
filmography.role_description: A character in the entourage of the temptress Doña Sol.
filmography.plot: An illiterate peasant rises to fame as a matador but is torn between his loving wife and a beautiful aristocrat.

filmography.title: Rancho Notorious
filmography.role_description: An outlaw hiding out at the Chuck-a-Luck ranch.
filmography.plot: A rancher obsessed with revenge for the murder of his fiancée infiltrates a remote outlaw hideout run by a former saloon singer.

filmography.title: The Blue Gardenia
filmography.role_description: A police captain investigating a murder involving a telephone operator.
filmography.plot: A woman accused of murder tries to clear her name with the help of a columnist.

filmography.title: Westward Ho the Wagons!
filmography.role_description: The leader of a wagon train guiding settlers across Indian territory.
filmography.plot: A wagon train of settlers faces danger and adventure as they travel the Oregon Trail.

filmography.title: Samson and Delilah
filmography.role_description: A messenger who brings news to the Danites.
filmography.plot: When strongman Samson rejects the love of the beautiful Delilah, she seeks vengeance that brings down the temple.

filmography.title: Lydia
filmography.role_description: A handsome football player who has a romance with the title character.
filmography.plot: An old woman invites four of her past suitors to tea to recall their romances and discover which one she truly loved.

filmography.title: Winged Victory
filmography.role_description: A lieutenant in the Army Air Forces during WWII.
filmography.plot: The training and combat experiences of a group of recruits in the US Army Air Forces during World War II.

filmography.title: The Good Humor Man
filmography.role_description: An insurance investigator involved in a murder mystery.
filmography.plot: A Good Humor ice cream man gets involved in a murder when a woman uses his truck to hide from gangsters.

filmography.title: The Great Lover
filmography.role_description: A murderer on a cruise ship who tangles with Bob Hope's character.
filmography.plot: A reporter on a cruise ship finds himself in trouble when he falls for a duchess and tangles with a murderer.

filmography.title: Jungle Jim
filmography.role_description: A photographer who accompanies Jungle Jim on an expedition.
filmography.plot: Jungle Jim leads a safari to find a rare medicine to stop a polio epidemic, battling a witch doctor along the way.

filmography.title: Variety Girl
filmography.role_description: Cameo appearance as himself in this musical comedy.
filmography.plot: A young girl tries to break into the movies with the help of the Variety Club, featuring many Paramount stars.

filmography.title: Blue, White and Perfect
filmography.role_description: A smooth operator involved in diamond smuggling.
filmography.plot: Private investigator Michael Shayne tries to stop a gang of diamond smugglers operating between Honolulu and the US.

filmography.title: Man at Large
filmography.role_description: A newspaper reporter investigating a Nazi spy ring.
filmography.plot: A reporter and a debutante try to track down an escaped German flyer in America.

filmography.title: Thunder in the Pines
filmography.role_description: A logger who competes with his rival for a contract and a woman.
filmography.plot: Two loggers feud over a timber contract and a woman in the backwoods.

filmography.title: Jungle Goddess
filmography.role_description: An adventurer who searches for a missing heiress in the African jungle.
filmography.plot: Two pilots track down a missing heiress who has become the goddess of a jungle tribe.

filmography.title: Forever Female
filmography.role_description: A father who gets involved in the theatrical ambitions of his daughter.
filmography.plot: An aging actress refuses to accept roles that suit her age, causing conflict with her producer and a young playwright.

filmography.title: Special Agent
filmography.role_description: A railroad detective hunting down train robbers.
filmography.plot: A railroad agent tracks two brothers who robbed a train and killed the payroll guard.

filmography.title: Bugles in the Afternoon
filmography.role_description: A cavalry officer at a frontier fort.
filmography.plot: A former cavalry officer re-enlists as a private to clear his name and settles a score with an old enemy.

filmography.title: Dead Men Tell
filmography.role_description: A shady character involved in a treasure hunt.
filmography.plot: Charlie Chan is hired to find a centuries-old treasure map, but the mission turns deadly when a murder occurs on the ship.

filmography.title: The Adventures of Sir Galahad
filmography.role_description: The legendary knight of the Round Table in this serial adventure.
filmography.plot: Sir Galahad attempts to recover the sword Excalibur to help King Arthur fight off invaders and the magic of Merlin.
